typeOf :: Value -> Type #

Get the type of a value.

compOp :: Ord a => CompOp -> a -> a -> Bool #

Semantics of a comparison operation.

evalCompOp :: CompOp -> Value -> Value -> Maybe Bool #

Apply a comparison operation to two values. Returns Nothing if the values are not of the same type.
